author: Jay Bee
comment: I've been looking for this watch face for years. I love the idea of having digital/analog on the same screen. it's extremely stylish with all the regular perks that you get for having a smart watch, like weather, Footsteps, battery ect. On top of that if you don't like the color you can change it. In that regard it's like getting 5 watch faces for the price of one because I can change the colors for everyday of the week.  My  beef is that I can never get back to the default color it's my fav. watch face.
title: Excellent watch face

author: Simon Hayward
comment: Good looking watch face... But does not link to Google Fit? for that it is disappointing, please give us the option

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Simon,

We have plan to improve all our watch faces with GF support

Kind regards

title: Nice Watch Face..... But!

author: Herbert Hoelle
comment: Great watch face but does not work with Android Wear 2.0. Cannot get it to show up to apply. Disappointing.

author: Jeff Njuguna
comment: My New Favourite watchface! You guys make the best watch faces and this one is no exception! The only thing I wish it had was a locking feature so I don't keep accidentally changing the face colour after making my own custom colour, and also the option to save custom color settings would be great. Thanks and keep up the good work!

author: Giovanni Islas
comment: I keep trying other watcg faces, but always end up going back to this one. It has everything I need and it is fully customizable!  Best watch face in the android market!
title: Love it

reply.content:
Hi Marquis,

can you please try with reinstall?

Regards

comment: Can someone tell how to sync the mobile missed Calls and messages with the phone . Also , the app always crashes for some reason.

author: Amit Patel
comment: Looks fantastic, and love that I can change colors to match my outfit. I wish there was an option to disable the step counter, however. Question, what is "full ambient" mode?

comment: I can't seem to clean my unread messages to zero after I view them

comment: App is NOT 2.0 Compatible

comment: Works great I do wish the weather info was just a little bigger

comment: Nice watch but with no Google Fit Integration it is useless.

comment: It has a nice animation and is nice to have analog and digital time.

comment: Love the design! Looks fantastico!

comment: Nice watch face, highly recommended.

comment: Love it looks amazing

comment: Great watch face

comment: Nice!..

author: Timothy Landers
comment: Loved it...

author: Henry Jones
comment: Good face, but still shows that there are unread messages and unanswered call even though there are none. Have to swap faces to refresh. Sort this out and it will get five stars

author: Robert Peaco
comment: Sorry I purchased this app...been trying it for several months now. Weather does not update, phone battery does not update, missed calls and texts do not update. The only thing that work is the time and steps per day! UPDATE: I downloaded again like they asked and it STILL does not work SMH

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Robert,

just try to reinstall this face.

Regards

title: Don't buy

author: Artur Krzywanski
comment: Please make battery indicator smaller so it's displayed in full on Moto 360 2nd. Now it's cut off a little bit by the flat tyre.
title: Could be better

author: Troy Luchterhand
comment: I would give this 5 stars if the missed calls and texts worked.  It just reads 0. It doesn't know when I get texts.
title: Great except

author: Luigi Rostirolla
comment: Installed on my Nexus 6P, does not show up in the Android Wear app and also does not show up on my Moto 360 2.  I only see it in my apps on the phone.  What to do?  Thank-you, I uninstalled and reinstalled and all is good now.  Great face and thanks for the quick reply.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Luigi,

you can try to reinstall it. Make sure that your watch is connected during installation.

Regards

comment: One watch face gives you all date day month temp,missed calls,messages,steps and nice looking. Looking forward to your next face

comment: Love this face, wish when it isn't in full ambient it could move the display around to avoid burn in.

comment: I really like how this watch face looks with the LG Urbane. Seems to save on battery too!

comment: Only get 1/3 of the face in black and white

author: Leo Wojo
comment: This is a question.  I have already bought the face, is it possible to get it on my gear s2?

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Leo,

no, our watch faces are only for Android Wear watches.
We can make refund for you, just contact us via email.

Regards

author: Jatin Barot
comment: Very good

author: Placid Cardoz
comment: Using the nexus 6P the weather, missed calls and unread messages don't work. Other than that awesome work.                                                                        Update: I got it all to work. For those using Android 6.0 you can set permissions for each app. If you go into the Android wear app and then tap more on the watch faces, activate another watch face besides the torque one. Then tap the three dots on the top right of the torque face and then go to app permissions and set it on for all

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi,

did you check your connection with phone?
For weather you need to enable GPS on your phone.

Regards

title: Great watch face
